notes.note: For users with the unified search bar, search suggestions will appear ahead of browsing history by default.  This can be changed in Settings on Windows and in Preferences on Linux and MacOS.

Added new settings in about:preferences that allow you to stop intrusive websites from asking you to receive notifications or access advanced device features such as camera and geolocation, while still allowing websites you trust to use these features.
<!-- Blog post to be published, see https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1368744#c46 -->
Changed the location of Firefox Health Report from about:healthreport to about:telemetry

system_requirements:
## Operating systems
 - Android 4.1
 - Above versions

## Requirements
 - 50 MB internal storage
 - 384 MB of RAM
 - display at least 320 pixels high and 240 pixels wide
title: Firefox 59.0beta Beta
